name: local-json-db
description: Local JSON database with overlays to be used as fixtures database

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-script/register --require spec/loader.coffee --reporter spec --ui bdd spec/*Spec.coffee spec/lib/*Spec.coffee spec/acceptance/*.coffee
scripts.cover: COVERAGE=1 multi='spec=- html-cov=coverage/html-cov.html json-cov=coverage/json-cov.json mocha-lcov-reporter=coverage/coverage.lcov' ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require coffee-script/register --require spec/loader-coverage.js --reporter mocha-multi --ui bdd spec/*Spec.coffee spec/lib/*Spec.coffee spec/acceptance/*.coffee
scripts.cover-io: LOCAL_JSON_DB_COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE=1 ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require coffee-script/register --require spec/loader-coverage.js --reporter mocha-lcov-reporter --ui bdd spec/*Spec.coffee spec/lib/*Spec.coffee spec/acceptance/*.coffee | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Huafu Gandon <huafu.gandon@gmail.com>
